reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair grading. Highly knowledgeable in her field.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent at explaining complex concepts. Always available for office hours.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting course material, but lectures can be disorganized.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding classes. Homework is time-consuming but helpful.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and great at lab demonstrations.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are monotonous. Grading seems arbitrary at times.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of texts. Encourages class participation.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be impatient with questions. Tough exams.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions. Makes complex theories accessible.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of economic principles. Relevant real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips to museums are fantastic.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting topics but can be abstract. Essays are graded harshly.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer. Great balance of theory and practical applications.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Biased perspectives. Doesn't encourage diverse viewpoints in discussions.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant researcher and teacher. Makes complex topics understandable.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Solid grasp of the subject, but teaching style can be dry.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Assignments are creative and engaging.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Good industry insights, but could improve on classroom management.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Captivating storyteller. Fieldwork opportunities are invaluable.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Extremely knowledgeable. Challenging but rewarding coursework.
